member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Thermocouple
member.summary: A Thermocouple module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

example.para: The following code example uses a object to read the temperature of an attached thermocouple and the module chip's temperature, printing those vaules to the output window.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Thermocouple.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Thermocouple.GetExternalTemp_Celsius
member.summary: Gets the external temperature using the attached thermocouple.
member.returns: Returns the external temperature, in Celsius.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Thermocouple.GetExternalTemp_Fahrenheit
member.summary: Gets the external temperature using the attached thermocouple.
member.returns: Returns the external temperature, in Fahrenheit.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Thermocouple.GetInternalTemp_Celsius
member.summary: Gets the internal temperature of the chip.
